text: Volodymyr Hlyvka (born 24 August 1973) is a Ukrainian ski jumper. He competed at the 1998 Winter Olympics and the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Ukraine Category:Ski jumpers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumpers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lviv
title: Volodymyr Hlyvka
